name: Dapper Dan's Graveyard Smash
description:
Play Singleplayer or up to 4 players in Local Coop!

Bury the dead. Stay Alive. Cremate the Undead.

Made for Xbox Controller connected to the PC.

Interact with objects on X.
Sheath/Unsheath your shovel on B,
Aim with Shovel on Right Joystick,
Attack on Right Trigger (Hold for more damage and AoE)
